channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Analyzing the impact of a turbulent week for the CDC

item.title: FDA now providing daily updates on adverse events
item.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration is now providing real-time, daily publication updates on adverse event data from its reporting system.

item.title: Why endurance events like marathons should have weight divisions for heavier runners
item.description: In sports such as wrestling, boxing, rowing, weight lifting and the martial arts, athletes are grouped by weight to make things fairer.

item.title: Labor Day mission: Build social ties through live events
item.description: If your social life has been lived out in Zoom calls since the height of the pandemic, Labor Day weekend is prime time for a reboot.
